TopicTitle: Is ksp ps4 up in Canada yet?

Articles.Content: I'm curious as to whether or not ksp on ps4 launches on the same date as in the u.s

Maybe its not up for you as well ... Eurogamer just crashed my hype rocket with this:

UPDATE 4.30PM BST: Kerbal Space Program will not be released on PS4 in Europe this week - only in the US. That's what Nestor Gomez, producer, told me this afternoon.

"KSP will not be available this week in Europe," he said. "We still don't have a date we can confirm but we are doing everything in our hands to have it ready as soon as possible."

The good news, however, is that we have an Xbox One release date for both America and Europe and it's this Friday, 15th July.

Check it out yourself ...

Edited July 12, 2016 by QPDO

Then you might be lucky and just have to wait till the store updates.

We've hit a glitch in the matrix with our Europe release. I'm looking into it, but I don't think we'll release in Europe this wek.
just make an US account - I will do it now

8 minutes ago, Watzlawick said:

just make an US account - I will do it now

it's just not updated on the US store yet

3 hours ago, KasperVld said:

We've hit a glitch in the matrix with our Europe release. I'm looking into it, but I don't think we'll release in Europe this wek.

is it north america that gets it today?  or just the US?
Anyhwere served by Sony Computer Entertainment America

well the store is down, so its close..

i really wish they could update the store in a way that doesnt render the thing completely broken while they do it.

 

EDIT!  9:20 am,  i just began my download!!!!   but it was frustrating to get it started.  it involved alot of page refreshing on my computer, and the store messed up again when i hit confirm.  but it was placed in my library and my download just started!!!!!

Edited July 12, 2016 by DD_bwest
Have fun While KSP for PS4 would have been a day one buy for me, I will have a look at how well it performs until the EU release.
